events.name: Landslide in Petrópolis, Brazil
events.wd_description: A landslide triggered by heavy rains in Petrópolis, Brazil, resulted in 110 fatalities, with many still missing, and caused widespread destruction.
events.description: A landslide triggered by heavy rains in Petrópolis, Brazil, resulted in 110 fatalities, with many still missing, and caused widespread destruction.

events.name: Landslide
events.wd_description: A wave of landslides caused by torrential rains led to massive casualties and destruction in the city of Petrópolis, with over 110 fatalities and 134 people still missing.
events.description: A wave of landslides caused by torrential rains led to massive casualties and destruction in the city of Petrópolis, with over 110 fatalities and 134 people still missing.

events.name: Search and Rescue Operations
events.wd_description: Search and rescue teams worked through sludge and debris, rescuing 24 people while 439 others lost their homes; the search for more survivors continues.
events.description: Search and rescue teams worked through sludge and debris, rescuing 24 people while 439 others lost their homes; the search for more survivors continues.

events.name: Government Response
events.wd_description: Brazil's President Jair Bolsonaro, who was abroad during the landslides, directed ministers to provide urgent aid and planned a visit to Petrópolis.
events.description: Brazil's President Jair Bolsonaro, who was abroad during the landslides, directed ministers to provide urgent aid and planned a visit to Petrópolis.

events.name: UK Sanctions on Russia
events.wd_description: The UK has announced 65 new sanctions targeting strategic industries, banks, and business elites aiding Russia’s invasion of Ukraine, bringing the total sanctioned individuals and businesses to over 1,000 since the invasion.
events.description: The UK has announced 65 new sanctions targeting strategic industries, banks, and business elites aiding Russia’s invasion of Ukraine, bringing the total sanctioned individuals and businesses to over 1,000 since the invasion.

events.name: New Sanctions Announcement
events.wd_description: Foreign Secretary Liz Truss announced 65 new sanctions against a range of key strategic industries and individuals supporting Russia's invasion of Ukraine.
events.description: Foreign Secretary Liz Truss announced 65 new sanctions against a range of key strategic industries and individuals supporting Russia's invasion of Ukraine.

events.name: Key Targets of Sanctions
events.wd_description: The sanctions target industries and individuals supporting the invasion, including Russian Railways, Kronshtadt, Wagner Group, Alfa Bank, Alrosa, and several high-profile individuals.
events.description: The sanctions target industries and individuals supporting the invasion, including Russian Railways, Kronshtadt, Wagner Group, Alfa Bank, Alrosa, and several high-profile individuals.

events.name: t: Industries Targeted
events.wd_description: Sanctions target key industries supporting the invasion, such as Russian Railways, Kronshtadt, and the Wagner Group.
events.description: Sanctions target key industries supporting the invasion, such as Russian Railways, Kronshtadt, and the Wagner Group.

events.name: t: Individuals Targeted
events.wd_description: Sanctions target individuals including Eugene Shvidler, Oleg Tinkov, Herman Gref, and Polina Kovaleva, among others.
events.description: Sanctions target individuals including Eugene Shvidler, Oleg Tinkov, Herman Gref, and Polina Kovaleva, among others.

events.name: Impact and Measures
events.wd_description: The sanctions include asset freezes, travel bans, and transport sanctions, aiming to degrade the Russian economy and prevent sanctioned individuals from conducting business in the UK.
events.description: The sanctions include asset freezes, travel bans, and transport sanctions, aiming to degrade the Russian economy and prevent sanctioned individuals from conducting business in the UK.

events.name: t: Asset Freeze
events.wd_description: The asset freeze prevents any UK citizen or business from dealing with funds or economic resources owned, held, or controlled by the designated person.
events.description: The asset freeze prevents any UK citizen or business from dealing with funds or economic resources owned, held, or controlled by the designated person.

events.name: t: Travel Ban
events.wd_description: The travel ban prevents designated individuals from entering or remaining in the UK.
events.description: The travel ban prevents designated individuals from entering or remaining in the UK.

events.name: t: Transport Sanctions
events.wd_description: Transport sanctions make it a criminal offense for any Russian aircraft to fly or land in the UK, and ban Russian ships from UK ports.
events.description: Transport sanctions make it a criminal offense for any Russian aircraft to fly or land in the UK, and ban Russian ships from UK ports.

events.name: Severe flooding in Sumatra, Indonesia, January 2022
events.wd_label: Severe flooding in Sumatra, Indonesia, January 2022
events.wd_description: Torrential rains in Sumatra, Indonesia, caused severe flooding, displacing over 30,000 people and leading to the deaths of two children, with significant damage to crops and concerns about a potential COVID-19 spike.
events.description: Torrential rains in Sumatra, Indonesia, caused severe flooding, displacing over 30,000 people and leading to the deaths of two children, with significant damage to crops and concerns about a potential COVID-19 spike.

events.name: Flooding in Aceh and surrounding provinces
events.wd_label: Flooding in Aceh and surrounding provinces
events.wd_description: Heavy rain led to flooding in Aceh and surrounding provinces, submerging villages and towns, with Hatta's village underwater since the start of the year, and over 30,000 people displaced.
events.description: Heavy rain led to flooding in Aceh and surrounding provinces, submerging villages and towns, with Hatta's village underwater since the start of the year, and over 30,000 people displaced.

events.name: Impact on local economy and health
events.wd_label: Impact on local economy and health
events.wd_description: The flooding destroyed rice crops and disrupted day laborers, devastating the local economy, while fears grow of a rise in respiratory illnesses and a potential COVID-19 spike due to crowded shelters.
events.description: The flooding destroyed rice crops and disrupted day laborers, devastating the local economy, while fears grow of a rise in respiratory illnesses and a potential COVID-19 spike due to crowded shelters.

events.name: Response and mitigation efforts
events.wd_description: Local authorities declared a state of emergency, providing aid such as food and blankets, while planning for long-term solutions like the Keureuto Dam to prevent future flooding.
events.description: Local authorities declared a state of emergency, providing aid such as food and blankets, while planning for long-term solutions like the Keureuto Dam to prevent future flooding.

events.name: U.S. Battery Production and Recycling Funding
events.wd_label: U.S. Battery Production and Recycling Funding
events.wd_description: The Biden administration announced over $3.1 billion in funding for battery and component manufacturing, recycling, and second-life incentives to support domestic battery production and reduce reliance on foreign sources.
events.description: The Biden administration announced over $3.1 billion in funding for battery and component manufacturing, recycling, and second-life incentives to support domestic battery production and reduce reliance on foreign sources.

events.name: Battery Manufacturing Funding
events.wd_description: The Department of Energy (DOE) will allocate about $2.8 billion to support new, retrofitted, and expanded domestic operations for the production of battery materials and cell components.
events.description: The Department of Energy (DOE) will allocate about $2.8 billion to support new, retrofitted, and expanded domestic operations for the production of battery materials and cell components.

events.name: t: New Battery Manufacturing Facilities
events.wd_description: The funding will support the establishment of new battery manufacturing facilities in the U.S. to increase domestic production capacity.
events.description: The funding will support the establishment of new battery manufacturing facilities in the U.S. to increase domestic production capacity.

events.name: t: Retrofitted Battery Facilities
events.wd_description: Existing battery facilities will be retrofitted to enhance their production capabilities and efficiency.
events.description: Existing battery facilities will be retrofitted to enhance their production capabilities and efficiency.

events.name: t: Expanded Battery Operations
events.wd_description: The funding will support the expansion of current battery manufacturing operations to meet growing demand.
events.description: The funding will support the expansion of current battery manufacturing operations to meet growing demand.

events.name: Recycling and Second-Life Funding
events.wd_description: The DOE will allocate $60 million for the research and development of second-life sources for EV batteries and support projects to recycle EV batteries into the battery supply chain or use them in other applications.
events.description: The DOE will allocate $60 million for the research and development of second-life sources for EV batteries and support projects to recycle EV batteries into the battery supply chain or use them in other applications.

events.name: t: Second-Life Battery Research
events.wd_description: Funding will support research and development of second-life sources for EV batteries to extend their usability and reduce waste.
events.description: Funding will support research and development of second-life sources for EV batteries to extend their usability and reduce waste.

events.name: t: Battery Recycling Projects
events.wd_description: Projects will focus on recycling EV batteries into the battery supply chain to broaden access to raw materials and support sustainable practices.
events.description: Projects will focus on recycling EV batteries into the battery supply chain to broaden access to raw materials and support sustainable practices.

events.name: Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act Support
events.wd_label: Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act Support
events.wd_description: The more than $7 billion dedicated by Congress in the bipartisan Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act will support improving the domestic battery supply chain, including nearly $3 billion for battery production and recycling programs.
events.description: The more than $7 billion dedicated by Congress in the bipartisan Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act will support improving the domestic battery supply chain, including nearly $3 billion for battery production and recycling programs.

events.name: t: Battery Material Processing Grants
events.wd_description: Grants will support the creation of new manufacturing facilities for battery material processing to enhance domestic production capabilities.
events.description: Grants will support the creation of new manufacturing facilities for battery material processing to enhance domestic production capabilities.

events.name: t: Rare Earth Demonstration Facility Funding
events.wd_label: t: Rare Earth Demonstration Facility Funding
events.wd_description: $140 million will fund a rare earth demonstration facility and refinery to help supply materials for lithium-ion batteries.
events.description: $140 million will fund a rare earth demonstration facility and refinery to help supply materials for lithium-ion batteries.
